edu.cmu.pslc.logging.distiller

Class ChineseDistiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.distiller.ChineseDistiller

  • public class ChineseDistiller
extends java.lang.Object
    Change the files Connie and Derek gave us and put them in our format. Assumptions: 1. that every of data has the same number of conditions, KCs and custom fields
    Version:
    $Revision: 8625 $
    Last modified by: $Author: mkomisin $
    Last modified on: $Date: 2013-01-31 09:03:36 -0500 (Thu, 31 Jan 2013) $
    Author:
    Alida Skogsholm
